Malice surveyed the room and decided his presence wasn't wanted.  He 
returned to his quarters and reclined on his slightly small bed.
<A group of mercenaries, huh?  Part of one of the mercenary guilds 
maybe?  Some mercenaries.  Probly a bunch youngsters.  Mercenaries 
doing charity work like this is nice and all, but dragging a bunch 
here isn't going to work very well.>
He opened the storage locker and pulled out one of the energon shards 
and began to noisily crunch on it.
<Its going to be more difficult than I thought.  Overboard mercenary, 
AWOL Maximal turned Predacon, what the hell is going on here?>
His thouights drifted further back to when he had his first encounter 
with Wolfblade.  He cracked a small smile, a rare thing for him, be 
cause she reminded him of Organics.  They acted the same way, same 
attitude.  Maybe Primus reincarnated he as Wolfblade. He dismissed 
the notion and continued to crunch the energon shard.  he shortly 
finished and remained in his quarters.     


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> OOC: Well I think that you should wait that Azure post that his 
char 
> left the base.
> 
> BIC:
> 
> Nighlight started to feel uneasy, she had the feeling that things 
> was leading to a danger for all
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
> wrote:
> > "When I want a child's lip, I'll be sure and ask for it kid.  
> Right now I don't think Rodimus should take a chance like this.  
> Your stranded, low on supplies; you can't afford to take a risk, 
> even in the name of honour." Malice said to Dragos.  "I would have 
> detained him and cure his illness while he was offline.  That's 
what 
> I was referring to.  Thats what the Rodimus I knew did."
> >
